summary: Created comprehensive user dashboard backend features checklist document (BEAUTY_MODULE_USER_DASHBOARD_CHECKLIST.md) for the React frontend team. The checklist includes 18 major feature categories with 100+ specific verification items covering all backend capabilities: booking management, gift cards, loyalty points, packages, reviews, consultations, retail products, salon search, wallet transactions, and more. Each item includes backend endpoint details, request/response formats, business rules, and implementation requirements. The document emphasizes that the Beauty Booking module must have a completely independent dashboard separate from other modules.
current_status: Beauty Booking module backend is fully implemented with comprehensive API endpoints for customer dashboard. All features are documented and ready for React frontend integration. The checklist document serves as a verification tool to ensure all backend capabilities are properly implemented in the React user dashboard.
